name: com.unity.xr.magicleap
description:
Provides rendering and spatial mapping support for Magic Leap.

NOTE: As of Unity 2019.2, Legacy XR support for MagicLeap is disabled in favor of XR SDK

samples.displayName: Example XR Input Pose Providers - Requires Legacy Input Helpers 2.1.2
samples.description: Example code showing how to implement custom pose providers for MagicLeap using XR Input
Example code showing how to implement MagicLeap-specific rendering optimizations
